ai-patthana11.4:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles consisting in thoughts.
ai-patthana11.4:0.3_0: I am skilled in specifically for myself,
ai-patthana11.4:1.1_0: (They are) not skilled in defiled and connected with the defilements.
ai-patthana11.4:2.1_0: ‘... for the sake of oneness and result.’ ...
ai-patthana11.4:3.1_0: (They are) not skilled in defiled and connected with the defilements.
ai-patthana11.4:5.1_0: (They are) not skilled in defiled and connected with the defilements, dependently originated.
